mapper.select: /* comm.noticeMng.selectPost : 게시물 조회 */ SELECT B.COM_ID, B.BORD_NO, P.POST_NO, P.POST_ORG_NO, P.POST_GRP_ORD, P.POST_GRP_LAYER, P.POST_TITL, P.POST_TITL AS TITLE, P.POST_CNTN, P.NOTI_YN, P.RPLY_POSS_YN, P.STRT_DTTM, P.END_DTTM, P.APND_FILE_UUID, P.VIEW_CNT, P.REG_USER_NO, P.REG_DTTM FROM comm_bord B INNER JOIN comm_post P ON B.COM_ID = P.COM_ID AND B.BORD_NO = P.BORD_NO WHERE B.COM_ID = #{session.comId} AND B.USE_FG = '1' AND B.BORD_NO = #{bordNo} AND P.POST_NO = #{postNo}
